caption: I haven’t been back to FuZhou for 10 years, this place really hits the spot. I had their wonton soup, braised belly, intestines, and peanut noodles. Noodles are a little light but in contrary I like my food really really salty  Must try - Braised everything, make sure you get the garlic sauce! Absolutely in love!  I could tell all the staff are very genuine and kind, that’s a huge plus that I love especially in Chinese restaurants.  Will come back again, will update my review if needed.
Loved their razor clam omelette and pan fried baos! Their pork dumplings were also very flavorful and juicy. Would definitely go again.

(Translated by Google) I really feel good, but I was so disappointed, two dumplings. Dumplings are as small as hamsters. It doesn’t matter if the pork belly and tripe are put in a box for me. The amount is very small. I really will not go there anymore. The most important thing is a small portion of tripe/pork belly. Two dumplings, 24 yuan, really, I have nothing to say 😶  (Original) 我真的感觉会很好，但是太让我失望了，两份饺子。，饺子像仓鼠那么小，猪肚牛肚给我放一个盒子里这无所谓，量非常小，我真的在也不会去了，最最最重要的是，一小份牛肚/猪肚，两份饺子，24块钱，真的，我无话可说😶

(Translated by Google) As a fan of Shaxian snacks, this is one of the most unpalatable snack bars in Shaxian County. I went with noodles and flat meat and steamed dumplings, and I was very disappointed. First, Fuzhou flat meat and Shaxian flat meat are basically There is no difference. Second, steamed dumplings are not the mouse dumplings of Shaxian snacks at all. Third, the quality of noodles is not good.  (Original) 作为一个沙县小吃的粉丝来说，这是最难吃的沙县小吃店没有之一.  奔着拌面扁肉和蒸饺去的，吃的特别失望. 第一，福州扁肉和沙县扁肉根本没有区别， 第二，蒸饺根本不是沙县小吃的老鼠饺. 第三，拌面面质不行.
love the combo platter that sauce and sha xian wonton, taro cake, sha xiao dumpling
Very nice for me the food there is great for anytime of the day morning noon or night
